pages.text: This is a tutorial on how to force load chunks without using $(l:genesis/chunk_claiming)Open Parties & Claims by xaero96$(). $(br2)I highly recommend crafting the chunk loaders first before following the instructions in this entry.

Notice: This mod does not grant chunk ownership for individual players or teams. That's for $(l:genesis/chunk_claiming)Open Parties & Claims$() to take care of. $(br2)The recipes for each Chunk Loader can be found over the next few pages.

If you have already placed down your Chunk Loader, you can right click it to access the interface. $(br2)To open the interface for chunk loaders if you are NOT directly in front of your Chunk Loader, you have to press the $(5)backwards slash$() key. $(br2)This will open up a small window where you can click on individual chunks to force load.

pages.title: Basic Tier
pages.text: This is the recipe for the Basic Chunk Loader. It can load an area of 3x3 chunks.

pages.title: Advanced Tier
pages.text: This is the recipe for the Advanced Chunk Loader. It can load an area of 5x5 chunks.

pages.title: Ultimate Tier
pages.text: This is the recipe for the Ultimate Chunk Loader. It can load an area of 7x7 chunks.
Again, this is a friendly reminder on how to open the Chunk Loader interface. $(br2)Simply press the $(5)backwards slash$() key on your keyboard.
